description: Assists you in upgrading old or obsolete code and more

bc-al-upgradeassistant.claude.apiKey.description: API Key for accessing Claude API

bc-al-upgradeassistant.claude.model.description: Claude model to use for API requests
enumDescriptions: Claude 3.7 Sonnet - Most intelligent model
Claude 3.5 Sonnet - Good balance of performance and cost
Claude 3.5 Haiku - Fast and efficient for daily tasks
Claude 3 Opus - Most capable model, highest cost
Claude 3 Haiku - Original Haiku model
Claude 2.0 - Legacy model
Claude Instant - Low-latency model for simple tasks

bc-al-upgradeassistant.claude.maxTokens.description: Maximum number of tokens Claude can generate in a response

bc-al-upgradeassistant.claude.temperatur.description: Temperature parameter for Claude API (0-1). Lower values produce more deterministic outputs, higher values more creative ones.

bc-al-upgradeassistant.defaultSystemProm.default: You are an expert AL and C/AL programming assistant for Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central. Provide accurate, concise, and helpful responses focused on best practices.
bc-al-upgradeassistant.defaultSystemProm.description: Default system prompt to use with AI models when a prompt definition doesn't include one

bc-al-upgradeassistant.defaultLanguage.description: Default language code to use in prompts with {{language}} placeholder

default.commandDescription: Convert C/AL code to modern AL syntax
default.systemPrompt: You are an expert AL and C/AL programming assistant. You help developers convert legacy C/AL code to modern AL code for Business Central.
default.userPrompt:
Please convert the following C/AL code to AL:

{{code}}

default.commandDescription: Review AL code for best practices
default.systemPrompt: You are an AL code reviewer specializing in Business Central best practices.
default.userPrompt:
Review the following AL code and suggest improvements for performance and readability:

{{code}}

default.commandDescription: Explain complex logic using Opus model
default.systemPrompt: You are an expert AL code explainer for Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central.
default.userPrompt:
Explain in detail how the following complex algorithm works:

{{code}}

default.commandDescription: Quick code formatting using Haiku model
default.systemPrompt: You are a code formatter that improves readability without changing functionality.
default.userPrompt:
Format and improve the indentation of this code without changing its functionality:

{{code}}

bc-al-upgradeassistant.prompts.description: Collection of prompts for AI models

commandName.description: Unique command name for this prompt (no spaces)

commandDescription.description: Description of what the command does (shown in the selection dialog)

model.description: Specific model to use for this prompt
enumDescriptions: Claude 3.7 Sonnet - Most intelligent model
Claude 3.5 Sonnet - Good balance of performance and cost
Claude 3.5 Haiku - Fast and efficient for daily tasks
Claude 3 Opus - Most capable model, highest cost
Claude 3 Haiku - Original Haiku model

disabled.description: Whether this prompt is disabled and should not appear in the selection dialog

userPrompt.description: User prompt template for AI models

idRangesOnly.description: Whether to filter table/page fields to include only those within app.json ID ranges

bc-al-upgradeassistant.autoSaveAlCode.description: Automatically save AL code blocks from AI model responses

enumDescriptions: Ask which code blocks to save
Save all code blocks automatically
bc-al-upgradeassistant.codeSaveMode.description: How to handle multiple AL code blocks in AI responses

bc-al-upgradeassistant.debugMode.description: When enabled, shows the prompt being sent to the AI model in an editor window

bc-al-upgradeassistant.documentationIds.description: Collection of documentation IDs for reference

bc-al-upgradeassistant.workingObjectFold.description: Locations where the working AL objects are by type

bc-al-upgradeassistant.upgradedObjectFol.description: Locations where to save upgraded AL objects by type

basePath.description: Base folder for upgraded AL objects when no specific type folder is defined

bc-al-upgradeassistant.userId.description: User identifier for toggling documentation reference status.

bc-al-upgradeassistant.enableSrcExtracti.description: Enable extraction of source files from .app files

bc-al-upgradeassistant.srcExtractionPath.description: Centralized Path where extracted source files will be saved by version

bc-al-upgradeassistant.fieldSuggestion.e.description: Enable field name suggestions for unknown fields

bc-al-upgradeassistant.fieldSuggestion.c.description: Field cache timeout in seconds (how often to refresh the field definitions)

bc-al-upgradeassistant.symbolCache.proce.description: Delay in milliseconds before processing symbol cache updates after file changes. Default is 25000 (25 seconds). Minimum is 100ms.

bc-al-upgradeassistant.languageModelBack.description: Determines the language model backend used for prompt processing.
enumDescriptions: Use the Claude API for processing prompts.
Use the integrated VS Code Language Model API for processing prompts.

bc-al-upgradeassistant.vscodeLanguageMod.description: Select the model identifier to use for prompt processing
enumDescriptions: GPT-4o mini - Efficient model for general coding and analysis tasks
o3-mini - Fast and lightweight model suitable for simple tasks
Claude 3.5 Sonnet - Balanced model with strong reasoning and coding capabilities
Claude 3.7 Sonnet - Best coding capabilities
Claude 3.7 Sonnet - Thinking - Best coding capabilities with reasoning
Gemini 2.0 Flash - Quick responses with good accuracy for common development tasks
